data.name: Cache
data.description: The resource is used to maintain a cache and link it to the API lifecycle. It means that the cache is initialized when the

timeToIdleSeconds.title: Time to idle (in seconds)
timeToIdleSeconds.description: The maximum number of seconds an element can exist in the cache without being accessed. The element expires at this limit and will no longer be returned from the cache. The default value is 0, which means no timeToIdle (TTI) eviction takes place (infinite lifetime).

timeToLiveSeconds.title: Time to live (in seconds)
timeToLiveSeconds.description: The maximum number of seconds an element can exist in the cache regardless of use. The element expires at this limit and will no longer be returned from the cache. The default value is 0, which means no timeToLive (TTL) eviction takes place (infinite lifetime).

maxEntriesLocalHeap.title: Max entries on heap
maxEntriesLocalHeap.description: The maximum objects to be held in local heap memory (0 = no limit).

data.name: Cache Redis
data.description: The resource is used to maintain a cache and link it to the API lifecycle. Redis provides a different range of persistence options, it means that the cache can keep data after reboot.

data.name: LDAP Authentication Provider
data.description: The resource is defined to authenticate a user in LDAP.

data.name: Inline Authentication Provider
data.description: The resource is defined to authenticate a user in memory.

data.name: HTTP Authentication Provider
data.description: Gravitee.io HTTP Authentication Provider resource is used to validate user's credentials against an HTTP server.

data.name: HTTP Authentication Provider
data.description: Gravitee.io HTTP Authentication Provider resource is used to validate user's credentials against an HTTP server.

data.name: Confluent Schema Registry
data.description: The resource is used to get serialization/deserialization schema from a Confluent schema registry.

data.name: Gravitee.io AM AS
data.description: The resource is defined to introspect an access_token generated by a generic OAuth2 authorization server.

serverURL.title: Server URL
serverURL.description: The URL of the Access Management server.

version.title: Version
version.description: The version of the Access Management server.

securityDomain.title: Security domain
securityDomain.description: The security domain (realm) from where the token has been generated and must be introspect.

userClaim.title: User claim
userClaim.description: User claim field used to store end user on log analytics

oauthResource.title: OAuth2 resource
oauthResource.description: OAuth2 resource used to validate token.

extractPayload.title: Extract OAuth2 payload
extractPayload.description: Push the token endpoint payload into the 'oauth.payload' context attribute.

checkRequiredScopes.title: Check scopes
checkRequiredScopes.description: Check required scopes to access the resource

requiredScopes.title: Required scopes
requiredScopes.description: List of required scopes to access the resource.

modeStrict.title: Mode strict
modeStrict.description: Check scopes with exactly those configured

propagateAuthHeader.title: Propagate Authorization header
propagateAuthHeader.description: Allows to propagate Authorization header to the target endpoints
